title: (15210) Noia - 74 Aldea Abruñeiras

title: (15210) Noia - 13 Aldea Carracido
description: EROSKI gas station. Clean water

title: (15218) Noia - Unnamed Road

title: () Noia - Unnamed Road
description: Free parking at the port. No service. Calm to spend the night.

title: (15218) Noia - Aldea Taramancos

title: (15218) Noia - Aldea Taramancos

title: (15210) Orro -

title: (15287) Outes - Unnamed Road

title: (15999) Boa - 1 Lugar Telleira

title: (15212) Roo de Abaixo -
description: We did not find anything for park4night in this area and leaving the Do Tambre suspension bridge and power plant towards Santiago de Compostela we found this perfect spot for dinner or overnight. It is more or less flat and shaded by trees. Few cars pass, they do not bother.

name: AC Praia de Broña area.
title: () AC Praia de Broña area.
description: Area with two parking spots that you can stay up to two hours. Free services. But you can park in the parking space that are shared with cars like the comment from Outes police. You can stay and overnight but no opening awning, taking tables, chairs and etc… please respect to keep this area open for us.

name: Camping Punta Batuda

title: (15999) Miñortos - 10 Lugar Ribeiro
description: Picnic area with several tables and places to cook. Located next to the beach.

title: (15999) Miñortos - 30 Lugar Ribeiro

title: (15999) Gafa - 17 Gafa
description:
Welcome to Portosín Camper Park, our area for caravans and motorhomes located in Portosín, a town in the municipality of Porto do Son, A Coruña, in the heart of the Galician Rías Baixas.

Our area is located in a natural and quiet environment with views of the sea, ideal for disconnecting. In turn, it has all the essential services nearby (supermarkets, gas stations, pharmacies...) and an environment rich in activities, gastronomy and tourism.

It has 50 large spaces, bathrooms and showers, laundry, chill out area, black and gray water drainage, electricity, canteen-bar. Pet-friendly space.

title: (15999) A Gafa - 9 Gafa
description: It is a not very large land car park, next to a small and cozy beach with wonderful views of the estuary. It is very quiet, we slept through the night without problem, we were alone. Difficult access for AC, better vans or campers

title: (15287) Serra de Outes - 7 Rua Vistaalegre
description: Very nice and quiet place, where a path next to the river goes down, allowing you to follow the path of the lamprey. There are restaurants 250 meters and a bakery 400. Possibility to swim in the river. Source with drinking water. We spent the night without problem. Many friends of neighbors.

title: (15999) Porto do Son - 1 Lugar Pozo
description: nice beach Small parking lot on the beach with trees and a nearby house. Quiet and beautiful place to spend the night. There are no services.

title: (15999) Puerto del Son - 69 Pozo
description: Fountain/fonte with very good water flow right next to the road. Filling up with canisters or a watering can is no problem.

title: (15240) - 64D Rueiro Portiño

title: (15978) Porto do Son - 27 Lugar Cans

title: (15240) Muros - 48 Aldea Ribeira de Maio

title: (15978) Porto do Son - 30 Lugar Cans
description: Parking at Aguieira beach, large with shadows, showers, baths and a beautiful beach where kitesurfing is practiced and where there are swimmers. There is a small bar at the entrance. Night prohibited on the coast.

title: (15240) Muros - 92 Rua Ribeira Maio

The beach and the town are less than 5 minutes walking. There are no services. Capacity for 8-10 vehicles. There is some shade depending on the time of day. There is also the football field parking lot behind, which is much larger.

title: (15978) Aguieira - Unnamed Road
description: Aguieira beach free parking. Easily accessible and shaded trees. ideal to spend the day at the beach. access to it through a wooden walkway or crossing the shallow river.

title: (15282) Rois - 23 AC-543
description: Galp station on the way to Noia. Very friendly manager. We bought him a beer and he told us that there was no problem staying and even using the toilet. It closes at 10pm. Very quiet, quiet and almost perfectly flat.

title_short: (15978) O Campo do Prado - 25 Lugar Aguieira

Used parking esplanade.

Attached to the promenade and the beach with showers.

title: (15978) Porto do Son - Unnamed Road

Accés estret, recomanat només per fins vans a Jumper, Ducato, Boxer. There is no problem sleeping. Respect the environment! 2 or 3 km away is the salt d'aigua de Ribasieira.

title: (15978) Porto do Son - Unnamed Road

title: (15938) Bermo - 11 Aldea Bermo

title: (15979) Abuín -

In the evening you can see different illuminated places. Absolute calm. Nothing for motorhomes or very wide vehicles. The driveway is difficult to find. Always follow the gravel road and keep right after passing the house.

title: (15259) Muros - 128 Rúa Anido
description: Parking close to the city centre, with a tap water point without threads. Road to 100 m but it's pretty quiet.

name: Camping A Vouga
title: (15291) Camping A Vouga
description: Small campsite "A Vouga", by the sea, direct access by stairs to a white sand beach, in a beautiful bay. Simple and efficient reception. The toilets are new and clean. 2 plus: - very large and marked out pitches, some on the seaside and others on the pine forest. Impression of calm and wildness - the restaurant of the campsite is tasty with a quite remarkable value for money. For us the stay is well worth it, we really enjoyed ourselves

title: (15981) A Igrexa - DP-3302

name: Camping Os Castros
title: (15979) Camping Os Castros

title: (15259) Muros - Aldea Valdexeria

title: (15920) Rianxo - 3 Rúa Paseo do Porto

title: (15992) Boiro - 44 Aldea Magdalena
description:
Very cozy and quiet, ideal for families with children. The town is very close and has good shade, a picnic area and a park for children's games.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1 Approach the barrier so that it opens.
2 Park.
3 Go to the payment machine, enter the days of stay.
4 Pay with credit/debit card.

name: Camping San Francisco

title: (15992) Boiro - 49 Lugar Peralto

surrounded by trees and cows. in front there are wind farm mills.

title: (15948) A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705

title: (36612) Catoira - 4A Paseo Xelmírez
description:
A peaceful corner to spend the night but also the day in love or in family. If you have a dog he will be happiest with all the room there is at the water's edge.
Flat land, nearby picnic tables, playground, outdoor showers, breathtaking view of the river and the viaduct. There is even a huge open-air swimming pool accessible from 1 p.m. to 7 p.m. for only €2 (WC available only at the pool). Accessible by car, van and even motorhome! To stay there to sleep there is also no room for 10 cars, it will be better to go to the spot 200m before.

title: (15911) - 36 Lugar Lamego
description: Seira river beach. Picnic tables in the shade. Reduced parking space. There is a bar. In summer can be crowded. Quiet and pleasant place. It is reached by A Escravitude on the N-550 or from the Antequeira junction, in Rois.

title: (15910) Padrón - Aldea Agronovo
description: We had a quiet night. Place to sleep the night from Saturday to Sunday. Since on Sundays there is a market in Padron and they cut streets and it is difficult to get around and access the AC in Padron. The only downside in the morning is the noise of cars. This is the parking lot of a playground.

title: (36612) Catoira - 2 Paseo Xelmírez
description: Parking to visit the Torres do Oeste. Next to the train track. Dead end road with shadow.

title: (15293) Vilar -
description: Parking easily accessible from the main road in the large central square of the village, flat and close to the Horreo di Carnota and various commercial activities, a nice playground with a drinking water fountain, there are no prohibitions, the night is quiet and silent, during the day it is full of cars, except on Wednesdays dedicated to the market from 8.00 to 14.00

title: (15996) Porto do Son - 261 Lugar Tarrio
description: Quiet place, there are houses next door, good place to park and spend the night, very cool beach next door, no services.

title: (15293) Vilar - 111 Barrio Vilar
description: Drinking water fountain in the central street. There is an area to stop right next to it.

title: (36612) Catoira - 7 Rúa da Estación
description: Perfect for launching a machine while doing 3 runs right next to it.

title: (36612) Catoira - 16 Avenida Muiños de Vento
description: Beautiful site on the outskirts of Catoira. We slept on a Friday night and no problem. When you get to the lake, there is a path where you go up the hill, we went with a 4x4 but I think it can be accessed with any vehicle!

title: (36612) Catoira - 21 Avenida Muiños de Vento
description: Next to a disused quarry that is now a beautiful lake for swimming and for the animals to enjoy. There are two accesses to the place, the first one that you find is bad for going up with the AC and the second a little further on with which you get to the site well. quiet area with the possibility of bathing and walks. our motorhome is 7m and it arrived without problem. !!!!!!!There are two paths through which you can climb. one steep and full of potholes and another that is feasible to go with a large motorhome, see well on Google Maps or go down and look for the road before taking the first one you see !!!!!!

title: (15295) Carnota - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of a point of view on the Ria de Muros bay. The entrance is blocked by big stones so big campers won't be able to enter. Not sure if it is allowed to sleep here, but we did and you wake up with a wonderful view.

title: (15910) Padrón - 76 Aldea Extramundi de Arriba
description: Santiaguiño do Monte recreation area. Source Castañar Barbecue Very quiet. You can go down to Padrón by the staircase along the wall of the monastery.

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: Amazing place to visit. Beautiful views

title: (36612) Catoira - 22 Lugar tras Da Veiga
description: Historic windmills parking. Place with panoramic views. It is very quiet and alone.

title: (15291) Muros - 9 Lugar Ancoradoiro

title: (36647) Valga - 13 Lugar Carballa

Ample parking with some flat places to sleep.
It has no services, but it is next to the town with a cafeteria and bakery very close.
It has a small soccer and basketball court in the same parking lot.

title: (15917) Padrón - Unnamed Road

title_short: (15900) Padrón - 3 Rúa Porta Fondo da Vila

title: (15291) Muros - 24 Lugar Ancoradoiro

Villa which is the birthplace of St. James, landmarks great tradition of pilgrimage and 20 km from Santiago de Compostela and served by regular public transport. A great literary culture credited to the house-museum of Rosalia de Castro and Camilo Jose Foundation Cela.Gran. Variety of local cuisine (Padron peppers, lamprey, octopus ...)

title: (15900) Padrón - 27 Avenida de Compostela

description: Laundrymat

description: Small parking in Playa de Carnota with showers, containers and a bar nearby.

title: (15938) - 4 Rua Chazo
description: A perfect place on the beach to spend a few days, there is a shower, a toilet and garbage cans.

title: (15900) Padrón - 6 Rúa Defensa do Xardín
description: Very large esplanade and next to the botanical garden. Possibility of parking motorhomes of all sizes.

title: (15900) Padrón - 11 Avenida Pontecesures
description: Large public car park in a meadow with trees. Very quiet location at the entrance to Padrón.

title: (36618) Bamio - 58 Lugar Pedroso
description: It usually has propane bottles. They do not have to be from Repsol, collect cylinders from any other brand. Plus they are super friendly.

title: (15293) Carnota - Barrio Vilar
description: Small car park at the end of the road, there is no type of service. Absolute tranquility, 1 minute walk from the beach. Highly recommended.

title: (15295) Carnota - AC-550
description: Free service area behind the football field, just around the corner.

title: (15295) Vilar de Parada - AC-550
description: Laundry just before crossing access to the beach. washer and dryer. 1km motorhome area

title: (15293) Vilar - Unnamed road
description: Small parking lot rather for van or small cc. quiet, beautiful view

name: Camping Rioulla
title: (36618) Camping Rioulla
description: Nice family campsite with swimming pool and separate pool for toddlers/preschoolers. Small camping shop with essentials incl. Bread. Beautiful view of estuary and sunset.

title: (15295) Carnota - Unnamed Road
description: Parking al lado de parque infantil y picnic, último parking de caravanas ya que más adelante en la playa no se permite el acceso a autocaravanas. rodeado de árboles, muy tranquilo y con espacio para varias plazas para aparcar.

title: (15830) Negreira - 20 Rúa Castelao
description: Wastewater emptying service and clean filling. Dirt and level parking directly opposite. Next to emergencies and Civil Guard, very central.

title: (36618) Vilagarcía de Arousa - 63 Rúa Campanario
description: Distance to Rio Ulla campsite about 100 m. Large parking without restriction. Cemetery and beach. Building toilets, drinking water outside, sandy beach, also suitable for children and dogs. Extremely quiet, if bathers are gone. Picnic - tables Beautiful view of the water!

title: (15293) Carnota - 155 Aldea Pedrafigueira
description: Parking area next to the beach. Firm of land but in good condition.

title: (15291) Muros - 1 Lugar Ancoradoiro
description: Parking day and night next to the beach during the day many families, picnic places, meeting place at night tranquility at least in the month of March

name: Camping Ancoradoiro
title: (15291) Camping Ancoradoiro
description: Nice quiet campsite, lots of greenery, right by the sea. Nice restaurant and great view. Direct access to the beach and small bathing bay with cafe/restaurant.

title: (15292) Carnota - 12 Lugar Teixoeira
description: Seaside location. Lots of space. Great beach.

title: (15295) Carnota - Unnamed Road
description:
Area in the middle of the forest, flat for vans. Complicated for motorhomes. Very pretty and very quiet. Water change service 5 minutes away and the beach also 5 minutes away. Next to it is a more accessible area for motorhomes.
If quieren seguir teniendo el lujo de poder disfrutar de lugares para aparcar, respecten este bosque y no aparquen aquí

title: (15996) O Barrento - 135 Rua Caamaño
description: Beautiful on the beach of Río Sieira, lagoon, supermarket and nearby bar and incredible sunsets, to the north you can see Monte Louro and Finisterra

title: (15865) Brión - 1 Rúa Gondar
description: Flat parking in a very quiet area behind the Carballeira de Brión. Nearby there is a fountain where you can catch water, as well as an area with picnic tables and a playground.

title: (15938) Boiro - Unnamed Road
description: Toilets and showers at the beach, a coffee in the summer

title: (15295) Carnota - Unnamed Road
description: Wide and quiet forest area, very close to the beach.

title: (15291) Muros - 4 Lugar Ancoradoiro
description: Possibility to sleep in front of the beach. Just before the campsite by the roadside, there are tables and barbecues and water. On the other hand, road a bit busy. A lot of vans and motorhomes.

title: (15293) Carnota - 155 Aldea Pedrafigueira
description: What a fabulous location. Dump and refill point is 200 mtrs from the various points you can park up. The main car park by the beach had the posts and tape taken down on the 12th September. We stayed 3 nights over a period of a week and it was free of charge, but we were told by other campers that a charge had been imposed during July and August. Amount unknown. There are also other spots in the woods. Dogs are allowed on the beach out of season and between 22:00 and 11:00 in season.

title: (15295) Carnota - Unnamed Road
description: Pinar very quiet and spacious 200m from the beach without services of any kind. 200mts before there is a caravan service area for emptying and filling only for some since the tap thread pass is size xxxl so it is better to carry a large adapter, to see if this is read by the plumber of the concello, on the other hand not You go down to the parking lot next to the beach, they only authorize the use of cars there is surveillance, the pine forest, very good!

title: (15291) Muros - 30 Lugar Ancoradoiro
description: It is not a parking area per se. If you have all terrain better. Coast area. watch out.

title: (15292) A Gándara -
description: Magnificent spot, ocean view, accessible by van, narrow path with large stones and sand, motorhome to avoid, possible U-turn at the end of the path, direct beach access. Intact nature, thank you for preserving it!!!

title: (15292) A Gándara -
description: You get to the square by taking a small dirt road from the roundabout and following it for about 50 meters. Great ocean view and very calm. We slept here. The showers are at the roundabout.

title: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 13 Rúa San Lázaro
title_short: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 13 Rúa San Lázaro
description: Parking with site almost always.

title: (15292) A Gándara - 127 Aldea Lariño
description: Small roundabout with parking all around (please enlarge maps on the Internet, then you can see how to park). Nice view of dunes, sea and lighthouse. Boardwalks lead through the dunes to the beach.

title: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rúa San Lázaro
title_short: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rúa San Lázaro
description: Parking next to the pier, large sites and very quiet, town center 5 minutes away

title: (15258) Mazaricos - Rua Monte Picoto
description: Motorhome area of ​​Mazaricos.

title: (15995) Porto do Son - 18 Lugar Coviña
description: Pine forest in front of the beach with picnic area and barbecue. A beautiful and ideal place to eat. No sevices

title: (36612) Tarrio - 4 Vial Camino
description: Parking In Dimo. Flat and very quiet to rest. Two fountains and nearby children's park

name: Camping Rural Ría de Arosa 2
title: (15993) Camping Rural Ría de Arosa 2
description: Camping very well equipped. Beautiful sanitary. Washing machine and dryer available for 6 euros each.

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: Mirador parking with magnificent views of the sea and Arousa Island. You can go up again, for the landscape and sleep under the pines

title: (36618) Vilagarcía de Arousa - 102 PO-548
description: Vista ría Vilagarcía de Arousa, parking with picnic area. Good for overnight, there is usually another motorhome.

title: (15292) Carnota - Aldea Agrobello
description: Parking at the Torre dos Mouros. Archeological walk to do. Unobstructed view of the Ocean. Accessible only in Van. Narrow road for motorhomes.

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: All in height on the view of the sea and sunset next to the meadows where there are horses and cows. Without services and take away your waste

title: (15292) Carnota - 328 Faro de Lariño
description:
New communal area for 10 motorhomes in an incredible setting. On the beach next to the lighthouse. With drinking water and sewage drain and electrical outlet (did not work) every 2 plots. Gray water is to be emptied with a hose or bucket at the rear of the black water outlet.
Free tennis court. Nice place and recommended.

title: (15995) Porto do Son - 1 Lugar Trasdoanes
description: Parking attached to the wooden walkway of the promenade. Possibility to park quite flat. Showers, public toilets, restaurants and beach bars. amazing beach.

title: (15292) Carnota - Aldea Carballal
description: Beach parking. Showers. Beware of sand when turning.

title: (15863) A Baña - 16 Lugar Couto Carballo
description: Motorhome area in A Baña

title: (15995) Porto do Son - 1 Lugar Trasdoanes
description: Parking for beach visitors, sloping, sandy but firm surface. Fantastic view of the Furnas beach in the municipality of Xuño. A few meters further there is a bar and a restaurant.

title: (15980) Padrón - 11 Aldea Picaraña
description: New service area in Galp service station. It is free, although it is good to refuel or spend at the station.

title: (15995) Porto do Son - 1 Lugar Trasdoanes
description: A perfect place to relax by the sea. Sitting down to dinner watching the sunset is priceless. There are very few places with such charm.

title: (15292) Carnota - 277 AC-550
description: Flat parking. Quiet. Great view with fisher boats in the morning. Beautiful sunset.

title: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 3 Rua Castelao
title_short: (15940) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 3 Rua Castelao
description: Large parking area but quite busy. Ideal to visit A Pobra for the day and enjoy the area of bars and restaurants. We do not sleep in this place (we do not know if you can either)

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: View of the sea and the setting sun sinking into it. Right on a street with little traffic at least at night. Further up the road comes a nice lookout point with picnic areas.

title: (15839) Negreira - 24 Calle del Puente Maceira
description: Parking, somewhat inclined, with water. I asked the townspeople and there is no problem to spend the night. 10 minutes walk from Ponte Maceiras. Just declared "Beautiful town of Spain"

name: Camping Fraga Balada
title: (15995) Camping Fraga Balada
description: Camping Fraga Balada, familiar in Xuño, with a very pleasant atmosphere. Surfing environment. Very quiet place and good price. It has a restaurant and your pet is welcome.

title: (15292) Lira - 64 Rúa Lira
description: Drinking water source next to the Horreo de Lira. Point of interest to fill and visit the h'orreo

title: (15995) Porto do Son - 15 Lugar Trasdoanes
description: Beach parking. beautiful place surrounded by nature, calm. few places flat, however. no service.

title: (15220) Bertamiráns - 14 Calle Rueiro
description: Quiet free parking all day, with grassy area and river. Shops a few minutes walk.

title: (15292) Lira - 31 Aldea Miñarzo
description: Beach car park around a roundabout, with car park (not suitable for motorhomes, only vans) next to two restaurants, a playground and a picnic area with a fountain. There is a wooden path that leads to the beach, with showers, and continues along the coast to Portocubelo. We can see that there were more services (water emptying) and that they are no longer available. We stayed one night in July, but night not recommended

title: (36612) As Rañas - 15 Camiño As Rañas
description: Hermitage of San Cibrán. There are picnic tables and several more or less flat places to park. 100 meters down a track at the bottom there is a wide and flat esplanade with picnic tables as well. It can perfectly pass an 8m motorhome.

title: (15220) Bertamiráns - 6 Rúa das Pesqueiras
description: Clean and reliable coin laundry, there is also to wash the dog. There are USB points to charge the mobile.

title: (15220) Bertamiráns - Rúa das Pesqueiras
description: Curious service area along the city sidewalk, but it exists and is free

title: (15866) O Faramello - 5 Lugar dua franco
description: Small parking for 3/4 caravans. There is a garden with benches and a stream. It is located next to the Pazo del Faramello. Quiet area without noise, perfect for an overnight stay.

title: (15295) Carnota - 237 Lugar Caldebarcos
description: Old soccer field with good access for motorhomes. Well leveled overlooking the beach.

title: (15883) A Agrela -
description: The spot is located next to the football stadium (disused) sheltered from the wind, beautiful open view, with forest nearby. this spot avoids the big and steep climb for the next spot, which is in full wind. And often popular! For all types of templates The cops were on the Sardinian football, we saw and we said absolutely nothing.

title: (15883) Teo, A Coruña - 72 DP-6502
description: Viewpoint of Agrela. Spectacular views from Santiago to the Arousa estuary. It is accessed from the village of Agrela. Last meters with very strong slope. there is no shadow Somewhat windy area. Shortly before arriving there is a hermitage with carballeira and benches.

title: (15295) Carnota - 219 AC-550
description: Parking for three or four motorhomes or vans ... the access is narrow, it has a soccer field for children to play and a swing area also has three tables in the Recreation area. soccer. great views of Carnota beach

title: (36610) Villagarcía de Arosa - 100 Avenida Rosalía de Castro
title_short: (36610) Villagarcía de Arosa - 100 Avenida Rosalía de Castro
description: Parking of the railway museum in a safe area. Beach, toilets, showers, drinking water and children's playground are located across the street from the beach. Grocery stores and self-service washing machines are 6 minutes away on foot. Downtown within walking distance.

title: (15949) Areos -
description: Space for four or 5 small vans in the middle of nature, with a small cove and views of the estuary.
